a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Rate of disease burden from alcohol and drug use disorders, 1990
Disease burden is measured in Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs). This is given per 100,000 individuals. DALYs are used to
measure total burden of disease - both from years of life lost and years lived with a disability. One DALY equals one lost year of
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
